alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued December 22 at 6:55AM EST until December 24 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE FRIDAY NIGHT THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30 possible. * WHERE...Portions of east central Florida. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 AM EST this morning. For the Freeze Watch, from late Friday night through Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Many home fires occur during cold weather episodes. Use extreme caution with space heaters, keeping the heater away from all material that may be combustible, such as pillows, blankets and curtains.
